thread.title: Save up to 50% on dining out
thread.title_full: Save up to 50% on dining out - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save up to 50% on dining out
text: Claim your free two month membership to the Gourmet Society. The Gourmet Society is one of the UK’s leading dining clubs whose members enjoy great discounts at restaurants including Café Rouge, Bella Italia, Prezzo, La Tasca and Strada. Plus, choose from thousands of local restaurants, pubs and free-dining establishments. Here’s what you’re getting, for free (no payment details required): · Unlimited restaurant visits, unlimited savings · Instant access, start using it today · Free mobile app, convenient and easy · No set menus, a la carte choice · Great weekend availability How to claim Online - Register your details here Telephone - Call for free on 0800 043 1978 quoting “ TELEGRAPH FREE ”. You will then be sent a membership card in the post. You will also receive a welcome email containing a link which you can use to activate the Gourmet Society app- you can use the app to access your discounts immediately. Cards must be requested by Monday, November 30, 2015. TELEGRAPH SUBSCRIBERS CAN SAVE UP TO 50% ALL YEAR at more than 2,500 handpicked Gourmet Society restaurants with the exclusive subscriber loyalty scheme, Telegraph Rewards To subscribe visit telegraph.co.uk/subscriptions or call 08000 720 820 Terms and conditions 1.This offer is a free two month trial to the Gourmet Society 2. Cards must be requested by Monday, November 30, 2015. 3. Only one trial per email address. 4. Offer not available to current Gourmet Society members. 5. Please allow up to 28 working days for the delivery of your Gourmet Society trial card. 6. Gourmet Society trial cards are not transferable. No cash alternative for this offer. 7. Registration is required. 8. Participating restaurants are subject to change and discounts and availability may vary. 9. Advance booking may be required. 10. The card cannot be used together with any other offer or promotion or with any set-menus. Promoter: Gourmet Society, 63 Lower Hillgate, Stockport, Cheshire SK1 3AW. *Lines open Mon-Fri 9am-5pm, Sat 9am-4pm, Sun 11am-4pm. telegraph.co.uk
